name: Kitten Connect
description:
I made another puzzlescript game and I'm having so much fun, I'll probably make some more!

Slide the tiles around, matching the colors of the kittens! There are 12 levels in total, with a few more bonus levels in the source code.

https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=b326f7f848bdbec1a37f58e949ec15f0
